doc:
Arch Hall Sr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arch_Hall_Sr. 0 Archibald Williams Hall (December 21, 1908 – April 28, 1978), better known as Arch Hall Sr., was an American actor, screenwriter, and film producer, best known for making a series of B-movies in the early 1960s which starred his son, Arch Hall Jr. Hall used various names throughout his career including Nicholas Merriwether, William Waters, and Archie Hall. Archibald_Williams_Hall ( December_21_,_1908 – April_28_,_1978 ) , better_known as Arch_Hall_Sr. , was an_American_actor , screenwriter , and film_producer , best_known for making a_series of B-movies in the_early_1960s which starred his_son , Arch_Hall_Jr . Hall used various_names throughout his_career including Nicholas_Merriwether , William_Waters , and Archie_Hall .
